title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.2 - Due date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 152.2 - Due date

State Regulations

The due date for the filing of a New York State income
tax return is the last day upon which such return is required to be filed in
accordance with this Subchapter, or the last day of the period covered by any
extension of time allowed under Part 157 of this Article. As to the due date
for payment of the income tax, see sections
152.14
-152.18 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
152.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
